rules.name: Ada_Akses_CA_Factory
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND 3 AND ((4 AND NOT(5)) OR ((6 OR 8) AND NOT(7) AND 5)) AND 9
rules.label: Ada Akses

decisions.name: Check_If_Original_Delegated_Are_The_Same_Approver_HETO_Credit_Factory
decisions.label: Check If Original & Delegated Are The Same

decisions.name: Copy_1_of_Cek_Curr_User_Role
decisions.label: Copy 1 of Cek Curr User - Role

rules.name: Copy_1_of_Ada_Akses
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2) AND 3 AND ((4 AND NOT(5)) OR ((6 OR 8) AND NOT(7) AND 5)) AND 9
rules.label: Copy 1 of Ada Akses

formulas.name: func_NotificationBody_Delegated
formulas.expression: "Mohon lakukan proses approval untuk lead atas nama " & {!Get_Application.Lead__r.Customer_Name_Formula__c} & " yang didelegasikan oleh " & {!$User.FirstName} & " " & {!$User.LastName} & " (" & {!$User.BranchName__c} & ")."

formulas.name: func_NotificationBody_Reassigner
formulas.expression: "Lead atas nama " & {!Get_Application.Lead__r.Customer_Name_Formula__c} & " telah direassign kepada " & {!Get_Delegated_Approver_Name.Name} & " oleh " & {!$User.FirstName} & " " & {!$User.LastName} & " (" & {!$User.BranchName__c} & ")."

fields.name: editor_Original_LAO_Label
fields.fieldText:
{!$Label.slds_label}

Original Approver

{!$Label.slds_field}

{!Get_Cur_LAO_User.Name}

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Copy_1_of_Warning1
fields.fieldText: Maaf, Anda tidak bisa memilih Approver delegasi yang sama dengan Original Approver.
